headline: BofA Raises Western Digital (WDC) PT to $71 Following 2025 BofA Global Technology Conference
summary: Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of the 8 Best Inexpensive Stocks to Buy Right Now. On June 9, Bank of America raised its price target for Western Digital to $71 from $62, while maintaining a Buy rating on the shares. This optimism stems from insights gained at the 2025 BofA Global Technology Conference, where […]
